DOC.brief_summary: In study , investigator aim compare effect endotracheal intubation via direct laryngoscope ( DLS ) McGrath Videolaryngoscope ( VL ) intraocular pressure .
DOC.brief_title: The Effects Intubation Via McGrath Videolaryngoscope Intraocular Pressure
DOC.detailed_description: Total 50 American Society Anesthesiologist Grade 1-2 , Mallampati score 1 2 , age 18 65 patient plan undergo nonopthalmic surgery include study . Patients glaucoma , diabetes mellitus , cardiovascular pulmonary disease , American Society Anesthesiologist Grade III IV , Body mass index 35 , difficult intubation , undergo obstetrical surgery propofol , fentanyl , rocuronium contraindicate excluded study . Patients divide randomly 2 group direct laryngoscopic videolaryngoscopic intubation group . Patients preoxygenated % 100 O2 3 minute anesthesia induce use propofol 2 mg / kg , fentanyl 1 mcg/kg , rocuronium 0,5 mg / kg group . After 3 minute mask ventilation , patient intubate ( woman No:7-7,5 , men No:8-8,5 intubation tube ) oral route . systolic blood pressure , diastolic blood pressure , mean arterial pressure , peripheral oxygen saturation , perfusion indexwill record intraocular pressure measure ophthalmologist tonopen device record pre-induction ( basal ) , induction , 1,2,3,5 minute intubation , respectively . Period handle laryngoscope videolaryngoscope termination mask ventilation obtain end tidal carbon dioxide accept application time record . Study terminate 5th minute value take .
